H0.text: Who first achieved stardom as the gangster Duke Mantee in the film 'The Petrified Forest'. James Cagney

H1.text: Who first achieved stardom as the gangster Duke Mantee in the film 'The Petrified Forest'. Edward G. Robinson

H2.text: Who first achieved stardom as the gangster Duke Mantee in the film 'The Petrified Forest'. Paul Muni

H3.text: Who first achieved stardom as the gangster Duke Mantee in the film 'The Petrified Forest'. Bogart

A4.text: The film was successful at the box office, earning $500,000 in rentals ($11,427,014 in 2025), and made Bogart a star.

A5.text: According to Variety, 'Bogart's menace leaves nothing wanting'.
